name: i'll see you in the eye of jupiter
name_original: i'll see you in the eye of jupiter
description:
a short, exploration-based game that i made in december of 2020.

this game is inspired by the song "reactor" by french artist woodkid, and tells a compact little story about love in space, love beyond the end of the world, a love that still matters in times and places where nothing else does. so - all love, that is.
